data.description: On scale from 0 (no itch) to 10 (worst imaginable itch), select the level of itching.
data.completeMessage: Thank you for your response. Please participate again tomorrow.

data.question:
How was your itch, <b>on average<b>, within the past 24 hours? 
Please select one number.

How was your <b>worst<b> itch in the past 24 hours?
Please select one number.
